1.text: ●Scene: Opening. The battle of the dragons and

3.name: Narration
3.text: That night, the mountaintop was shining red.

4.name: Narration
4.text:
Two shadows danced in the sky eerily illuminated
by the crimson flames.

5.name: Narration
5.text: Those shadows danced as if performing a waltz.

6.name: Narration
6.text:
Or perhaps, as if circling the mountaintop in a
dogfight, they fought over and over.

8.name: Narration
8.text:
However, the battle for dominance in the sky did
not last long. Gradually, one of the shadows lost
its strength, became wounded, and scattered blood
on the mountain peaks.

9.name: Narration
9.text:
And finally, one of the shadows lost altitude and
fell into the unknown darkness.

10.name: Narration
10.text:
The victorious shadow danced in the night sky as
if laughing in triumph, performing a dance of joy.

11.name: Narration
11.text:
And before long, the victorious shadow also
disappeared into the darkness of the night.

13.name: Narration
13.text:
The people living nearby the extraordinary
spectacle were frightened, wondering if it was an
ill omen, but not a single person had the courage
to go and check.

14.name: Narration
14.text:
They could only pray desperately to the guardian
god Ishupel, fearing that misfortune would befall
them, and beg for forgiveness, while trembling in
fear.

15.name: Narration
15.text: ──────That was the event of last night.

22.name: Narration
22.text:
In front of the female adventurer, freshly cooked
dishes that whet the appetite were brought. There
was a sizzling sound as the duck skewers, oozing
with meat juices, were carried over. Also, a pie
filled with sweet and sour berries picked in the
village, and top-quality wine.

23.name: Narration
23.text:
The female adventurer, Enituura, couldn't help but
smile happily at the thought of being able to
enjoy the best feast that this village had to
offer.

24.name: Eni-sensei
24.text:
"Thank you very much. Yes, it has a truly
wonderful aroma."

25.name: Shopkeeper
25.text:
"Hehehe, I've made sure to pick out the best for
you, Sensei! Please savor it!"

27.name: Eni-sensei
27.text:
"Phew... As expected, wine after a long journey is
irresistible."

28.name: Eni-sensei
28.text:
"It's been a while since I've been able to calmly
enjoy a meal like this. Occasionally, it's nice to
savor things slowly..."

34.name: Eni-sensei
34.text:
"It seems that I won't be able to fully enjoy the
meal for the time being."

36.name: Eni-sensei
36.text:
"Ahem. So, what's the matter? Is there some kind
of trouble?"

37.name: Villager
37.text:
"A... a dragon...!! A dragon has come to this
village...!!"
